# Confidence Interval and Statistical Inference

```{r, warning=FALSE, message = FALSE}

library("wooldridge")
data(wage1, package = "wooldridge")

t.test(wage1$wage)

help("t.test")

t.test(wage1$wage, alternative = "greater")

t.test(wage1$wage, mu = 5.8961)

t.test(wage1$wage, conf.level = 0.99)
t.test(wage1$wage, conf.level = 0.9)

testres = t.test(wage1$wage)
testres
names(testres)
testres$conf.int
testres$p.value
```
